title: Albedo expands staff and facilities
summary: Albedo also announced the opening June 8 of a Broomfield facility large enough to build three to four satellites simultaneously.

title: NASA concerned Starship problems will delay Artemis 3
summary: NASA has growing concerns that the lunar lander version of SpaceX’s Starship vehicle will not be ready in time for the Artemis 3 mission in late 2025, given the amount of work needed to get the vehicle ready.

title: Vulcan performs static-fire test
summary: United Launch Alliance carried out a static-fire test of its Vulcan Centaur rocket June 7, one of the final milestones before the vehicle’s first launch.

title: Nuview reveals backers  including actor Leonardo DiCaprio
summary: Nuview plans to launch, a Space Proof of Concept Satellite called Mr. Spoc, in a little more than two years.

title: Boeing hit with a lawsuit over alleged “theft” of SLS rocket tools
summary: "Without the engines installed and fitted perfectly, the rocket could not launch."
